SqlServer.Description: Host/instance of SQL Server to validate and use for the install.

Install:SqlServer.Description: Pass on SqlServer to the referenced script.

SqlAdminUser.Desription: Admin user name for the SQL Server instancce.

Install:SqlAdminUser.Description: Pass on SqlAdminUser to the referenced script.

SqlAdminPassword.Desription: Admin password for the SQL Server instancce.

Install:SqlAdminPassword.Description: Pass on the SqlAdminPassword to the referenced script.

SqlBuildVersion.Description: The expected minimum build number of the SQL Server instance for the installing version of Sitecore.

SqlFriendlyVersion.Description: The common name of the expected minimum build number of SQL Server.

SolrUrl.Description: The URL of the Solr instance to validate and use for the install.

Install:SolrUrl.Description: Pass on the SolrUrl to the referenced script.

SolrRoot.Description: The directory path of the Solr instance to validate and use for the install.

Install:SolrRoot.Description: Pass on the SolrRoot to the referenced script.

SolrService.Description: The name of the Solr service to validate and use for the install.

Install:SolrService.Description: Pass on the SolrService to the referenced script.

SitecoreSiteName.Description: The name of the Sitecore site and app pool.

Install:SitecoreSiteName.Description: Pass on the SitecoreSiteName to the referenced script.

PostInstall:SitecoreSiteName.Description: Pass on the SitecoreSiteName to the referenced script.

TestSqlConnection.Description: Ensures the configured SQL Server exists and is the minimum supported version.

EnableSqlContainedDatabases.Description: Enables contained databases on the configured SQL Server.

TestSolrUrl.Description: Ensures the configured Solr Url is valid and responds.

TestSolrDirectory.Description: Ensures the configured Solr path is valid.

TestSolrService.Description: Ensures the configured Solr service is valid.
